summary:
Angola is a country in southern Africa, with a rich history dating back to the Paleolithic Age. It became a nation under the Kingdom of Kongo, which thrived in the 14th century and controlled the Atlantic slave trade with Portugal. The country gained independence in 1975 after a long struggle, but civil war broke out among different political groups.

Today, Angola is a stable republic with Luanda as its capital. It is the second-largest Portuguese-speaking country in area and population in Africa, bordering Namibia, the Democratic Republic of Congo, Zambia, and the Atlantic Ocean. The country also has an exclave province, Cabinda, bordering the Republic of Congo.
title: Angola
